title: Pandemic Tech Darlings Turned to Duds in 2021
sub_head: Those former tech sweethearts that experienced a reversal in fortune this year could remain in the dumps in 2022
body:
For a sector historically known for its fast-forward pace of innovation, consumer technology sure did a lot of backpedaling this year.
The Nasdaq CTA Internet Index is in the red this year compared with a return of more than 27% for the S&P 500. Cathie Woodâ€™s famed more than 30% of which was invested in information technology as of Sept. 30, has seen its net asset value decline 21% this year, underperforming the S&P by nearly 49 percentage points.
